sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽视或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: But we must reject isolationism and its companion, protectionism. Retreating behind our borders would only invite danger.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们必须拒绝孤立主义及作为其同伴的保护主义。

sentences.english: Buddies can be co-workers, family members, friends.
sentences.chinese: 同伴可以是同事，家人或者朋友。

sentences.english: I am lonely if I have nocompanyon the journey.
sentences.chinese: 旅途中如果没有同伴，我就很孤单。

sentences.english: Each man must not think only of himself, but also of his buddy fighting beside him.
sentences.chinese: 每个人不能仅仅想着他自己，还有他身后战斗的同伴。

sentences.english: That boy is easily led away by his companions.
sentences.chinese: 那个男孩很容易被同伴引入歧途。

sentences.english: One day she sets off to find her long-lost childhood friend.
sentences.chinese: 某天，她去寻找许久不见的儿时同伴。

sentences.english: While the dog gnaws bone,companions would be none.
She turned to her companion who shrugged.
sentences.chinese: 她转向她的同伴，他耸耸肩。

sentences.english: Some young people may have picked up smoking because of peer pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有些年青人可能出于同伴的压力而学会了抽烟。

sentences.english: He has a far off friend who lives in America.
sentences.chinese: 他有个住在美国的番邦同伴。

sentences.english: For most people, they are working outside while they don't have any companions by their side.
sentences.chinese: 许多人都在外面工作，没有同伴在身边。

sentences.english: Charles Luckman Success is the one unpardonable sin against our fellows.
sentences.chinese: 成功对于我们的同伴来说，是不可原谅的罪过。

sentences.english: Betrayed by his friends, nearly to death.
sentences.chinese: 曾因同伴背叛险些丧命，后为蛮幽王所救。

sentences.english: Any health limitations must be explained to your fellow paddlers prior to starting the trip.
sentences.chinese: 任何健康问题都要在开始旅程之前对同伴说明。

definition: to be on one's own/to be left alone/to be left out
to flee from sth/to run away/to escape
